About me

Hi! Im Celine and Im 21 years old. After spending the first 18 years of my life in a very small village called Portofino in Italy I decided to come to Amsterdam to study at Vrije Universiteit. In 2022, I graduated with honours in Communication and Information Studies: Language and Media.

Knight Academy Internship

I started my web development internship in January 2023. We started the internship by getting an overview of what we will be doing in the couple months. I learned that HTML is for structure, CSS is for style and Javascript deals with behaviour. Nonetheless, I soon found out that this internship would have thought me more than coding.

My Projects

I am currently journaling every week so that I can keep track of my progress and projects! If you would like to check out what I have been working on you can find me on GitHub :)
